channel.title: Hardscape F2P Server! |Whit Added Npc en items| *Downloaded 300+ times*
channel.description:
NAME: Hardscape F2p CLIENT: Pegglescape client (didden't change the pitcher)
Base Source: Delta Client i used: Xscape i give the most credits to him
Please Don't Flame for this 1 please, It's My First Release :o
Stuff Added!
* Duel Arena * Fist of Guthix Barb assault style :P * Rune Berserker shield * Rune gauntlets have spechial attack (rune gloves) * Full Karamja Dungeon * Full Varrock manhole * Full Edgeville Dungeon * Custom Crandor Island * Member Prayers Don't Work * Npc's Drop's Money * You need Anti-dragon Shield at Elvarg * Added Wildy Teleports * Training Teleports * Skilling Arena (Same as Nitrox) * Removed Slayer * Added Shops (New NPC's) * Made Black Knight Fortress New Home * Fiara is very strong USE PRAYER It Hit's 35 max! * Rune Crafting Arena (only F2P Rcing Stones) * Mini Game Teleport * I Made Fishing Spots in Skilling Arena Only Fish F2P Fish (Swordfish trains very good) * Range 2H Combo Works * Shopping Center Teleport * I Think Only People Whit Admin Powers Can Get To Member Places * Ah Skillcape Shop Whit Only F2P Skillcapeds * Skillcape Emotes (use Bow Emote) Matrix Emote (Angry) AFK Emote (Shurg) * Magic Workz as long you Don't Place Blood Runes In Shop They Can't Use Member Spells * All F2P Skills Work * I Changed Xp rate so It's Eazy 're to train You 're Skills * Smithing Gives Money
Home [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/156qtyc.jpg[/img]
Some Teleports & Prayer Message [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/jkw1op.jpg[/img]
Shopping Arena [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/33wo6ds.jpg[/img]
Skilling Arena [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/149qhza.jpg[/img]
Rune Crafting Arena [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2qmhusk.jpg[/img]
Edgeville Dungeon [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2m61jrk.jpg[/img]
Varrock Manhole [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/f01df4.jpg[/img]
Karamja Dungeon [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/fn4az6.jpg[/img]
Duel Arena [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/dyt7bn.jpg[/img]
Fist of Guthix [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/34so3vc.jpg[/img]
Rune Gauntlets Spechial Attack ^^ (Works Like DFS Spec) [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/axfmg4.jpg[/img]
Custom Crandor Island [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2qu11lc.jpg[/img]
Source Credits: Delta, Rune Aura, Beasty_x, Zee Beest, Sivan
Client Credits: Delta, Zee Beest, Xscape, Beasty_x
PS: i know The Source is Hardscape named en client Pegglescape but There bove mine :) EN THE LINK TO THE CLIENT THAT THE SERVER SAY'S IS WRONG I'M GOING TO FIX BUT NOT NOW I WILL DO LATER I'M TO LAZY RIGHT NOW
Source Download Link: You can download the link Under this post but If you Can't see Use This Link: http://files.filefront.com/HardScape+F2P+Serverrar/;13157275;/fileinfo.html
Client Download Link: http://files.filefront.com/Pegglescape+F2P+Clientrar/;13156948;/fileinfo.html
